text: Antirhea aromatica is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Veracruz state, in eastern Mexico. It is an endangered species, threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * aromatica Category:Endemic flora of Mexico Category:Flora of Veracruz Category:Endangered biota of Mexico Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Antirhea aromatica
